title: Intensity and drama will now replace festival of running rugby as World Cup enters realm of no second chances
text:
Now that the pool stages have almost wrapped up, this World Cup is about undergo a huge change in intensity and drama. From here, all slip-ups are terminal. On form, there are four sides who I believe can win this tournament – New Zealand, Wales, South Africa and England, although Ireland did their chances a power of good as they returned to form with Saturday’s thumping win over Samoa.

Whether or not Scotland’s game against Japan is played on Sunday, or at all, will obviously have been decided in the early hours. However, while that will obviously have an impact upon who plays who in the quarter-finals, with all due respect to both sides, I don’t think either have shown that they have the firepower...
description: Now that the pool stages have almost wrapped up, this World Cup is about undergo a huge change in intensity and drama.
